answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!It is difficult to comment without examining. It is possible that you had a vasovagal attack or sudden low blood pressure. Another possibility is that it is a transient ischemic attack or TIA. Especially if you have predisposing factors to TIA like polycythemia vera, sickle cell disease, diabetes, hyperviscosity syndromes, hypertension etc. Please get a prompt evaluation by your PCP.Hope this helps. Do let me know if there is any thing else and keep me posted. Take care!

question: Tonight I was washing the dishes and out of nowhere I get this really bad pain in my hands. When I looked down my veins were bulging really bad. They were huge. Then I got really weak and nauseated. Now my chest n all the way the left side of my body is hurting really badly. I feel as if I am loosing something bcuz I am getting weaker. I am so scared. Should I go 2 er? Does anyone know what happened? I feel cold in the inside and I felt felt like my heart skipped a few beats n I panicked.  Now my muscles are twitching badly.
title: large bulging veins
